editor_name: 测试饰品
测试剑
测试枪
测试斧
测试弓
测试杖

name: Iron Sword
editor_name: 前传线1-剑-N-武器1_剑
desc: A common iron sword that can be found everywhere and is often the first choice for self-defense among ordinary people. It may be somewhat unbalanced in weight and not very sharp, but when swung with force against wild beasts, it can still have some deterrent effect.

name: Spear
editor_name: 前传线2-枪-N-武器2_枪
desc: A combination of a sharpened blade and a wooden stick. This makeshift weapon may look crude, but it's actually lightweight and easy to use. In the hands of those lacking combat experience, it can be more reliable than other weapons.

name: Iron Axe
editor_name: 前传线3-斧-N-武器3_斧
desc: A weight-imbalanced axe that can handle rough work such as felling trees and chopping firewood. In addition to defeating enemies, it can also help conquer the daily necessities.

name: Wood Bow
editor_name: 前传线4-弓-N-武器4_弓
desc: The bow body is made of sturdy branches and cotton threads, with key parts that are easily damaged. Fortunately, the materials can be found everywhere. The shooting posture may be more important than accuracy when using this bow.

name: Apprentice Wand
editor_name: 前传线5-杖-N-武器5_杖
desc: At first glance, it looks like a polished ordinary tree branch that responds sluggishly to Luxite Blessing and lacks precision. However, it can be an excellent tool for testing the user's talent skills. Countless priests can still recall, even after many years, the wonderful feeling of Luxite energy flowing through their hands when they first grasped this crude wand.

name: Sharp Sword
editor_name: 前传线6-剑-R-武器6_剑
desc: Forged by a skilled blacksmith, this iron sword is of impressive quality, elevating the wielder's intimidation and self-assurance.

name: Glittering Sword
editor_name: 前传线7-剑-R-武器7_剑 1-
desc: Crafted by a master blacksmith, this iron sword has a razor-sharp edge that gleams with an icy light, making it a force to be reckoned with.

name: Pointy Spear
editor_name: 前传线8-枪-R-武器8_枪
desc: Featuring a resilient wooden pole with excellent flexibility, this weapon has been skillfully shaped for a comfortable grip. It can be used roughly without fear of splinters, and the spearhead is a genuine metal material, polished to a gleaming finish for an impressive weapon.

name: Defensive Spear
editor_name: 前传线9-枪-R-武器9_枪 1-
desc: The overall structure of this weapon is solid, and the spear handle has undergone hardening treatment, making it able to withstand fierce hacking and slashing attacks. For frontline spearmen, it's a rare and dependable weapon.

name: Battle-Hardened Axe
editor_name: 前传线10-斧-R-武器10_斧
desc: Although the handle may seem a bit old-fashioned, the axe blade has been carefully adjusted, making it perfect for breaking through the enemies' spears and shields. This weapon has a savage appearance, yet conceals a steady and composed temperament.

name: Heavy Iron Axe
editor_name: 前传线11-斧-R-武器11_斧 1-
desc: An axe that is particularly favored by those confident in their strength. Wielders must possess a stronger physical fitness, but the more they swing it, the more their muscles will grow!

name: Exquisite Wood Bow
editor_name: 前传线12-弓-R-武器12_弓
desc: Crafted from top-quality timber with superior elasticity and hardness, and combined with a bowstring made from cow tendon, this bow inspires confidence in even the most inexperienced archer. Although accuracy may be a challenge, determination can make up for it.

name: Accurate Bow
editor_name: 前传线13-弓-R-武器13_弓 1-
desc: The weapon reduces deviation and can be used easily even by novices, allowing them to confidently aim at their target and sometimes even surprise themselves with an unexpected success.

name: Solid Wand
editor_name: 前传线14-杖-R-武器14_杖
desc: With a fundamental level of precision in Luxite Blessing manipulation, this weapon is a hurdle that most apprentice priests must overcome in their journey. Before relying solely on Luxite Blessing to tackle challenges, it's essential to learn how to use the sturdy wooden handle to defend oneself.

name: Astral Rod
editor_name: 前传线15-杖-R-武器15_杖 1-
desc: An antiquated wand that can be used for writing, tinkering, or stirring crucibles. As a well-worn wand, it may have its limitations, but it remains effective and can be relied upon by the user. If it's not working properly, simply give it a tap and restore it to its former glory.

name: Precision-forged Dagger
editor_name: 前传线16-剑-SR-武器16_剑 1
desc: Crafted by the sandwich steel technique with the blade forged from top-quality steel exclusively reserved for the royal guard, this sword may have been expensive to procure, but its sharpness is beyond doubt.

name: Dueling Dagger
editor_name: 前传线17-剑-SR-武器17_剑 2
desc: With its uniquely designed gauntlet and a lightweight and highly durable blade, this sword empowers the wielder to easily parry many deadly attacks.

name: Ceremonial Knife
editor_name: 前传线18-剑-SR-武器18_剑 3
desc: Decorated with exquisite patterns and precious gemstones, this ceremonial dagger appears to be a work of art rather than a weapon. However, in an unguarded moment, this dagger could also become a highly dangerous weapon, capable of delivering a powerful blow.

name: Guardian Spear
editor_name: 前传线20-枪-SR-武器20_枪 2
desc: A standard arm weapon for palace garrisons, designed for easy production and maintenance, with a considerable level of durability.

name: Sharp Spear
editor_name: 前传线19-枪-SR-武器19_枪 1
desc: The long spear features a sleek and streamlined design, with a spearhead that appears to be expertly crafted like a dagger. Its head is sharp and precise, making it ideal for piercing attacks, while its double-edged blade is sharp and easy to chop with. The blade moves through the air like a biting cold wind.

name: Armor-piercing Spear
editor_name: 前传线21-枪-SR-武器21_枪 3
desc: To penetrate through thick armors and shields, the spearhead is infused with highly durable metal, often catching overconfident armored enemies off guard.

name: Formidable Axe
editor_name: 前传线22-斧-SR-武器22_斧 1
desc: The axe blade has a specialized curve, delivering a deadly blow to enemies with a well-angled strike.

name: Antimagic Axe
editor_name: 前传线23-斧-SR-武器23_斧 2
desc: An axe engraved with runes that absorb magic, created to help infantry soldiers survive against divine spells. It has since become a symbol of fear for many rookie conjurers.

name: Balanced Heavy Axe
editor_name: 前传线24-斧-SR-武器24_斧 3
desc: A finely crafted hatchet with a wonderful balance that harnesses the full strength of its wielder's body, making its weight almost imperceptible. However, this feature is not so friendly once the wielder is injured.

name: Vlderian Longbow
editor_name: 前传线25-弓-SR-武器25_弓 1
desc: This is the signature weapon for Vlder's soldiers, made from the familiar wood of their homeland. Even in mass production, it boasts a level of precision unmatched by other techniques of similar cost.

name: Steel Crossbow
editor_name: 前传线26-弓-SR-武器26_弓 2
desc: The crossbow fires steel-tipped bolts that can easily penetrate thick steel plates, making even elite knights equipped with shields and plate armors hesitant to charge against it.

name: Hunting Bow
editor_name: 前传线27-弓-SR-武器27_弓 3
desc: The compact and lightweight short bow is an essential tool for senior hunters. Even when chasing a prey through dense forests, it can quickly and accurately shoot with its meticulously adjusted draw weight, delivering just enough force to finish off the wounded prey.

name: Gazing Orb
editor_name: 前传线28-杖-SR-武器28_杖 1
desc: An eerie crystal ball seems to stare back with an unfathomable pupil when looked upon deeply, gradually causing the world to fade away, leaving only oneself and a profound abyss.

name: Explosive Crystal
editor_name: 前传线29-杖-SR-武器29_杖 2
desc: Some priests, after mastering the release of Luxite energy, attempt to push the output of the Luxite to its limit. Among them, the most skilled can maintain a critical state of the Luxite, preventing it from shattering. This expands the range of the Luxite Blessing influence.

name: Ink Totem
editor_name: 前传线30-杖-SR-武器30_杖 3
desc: A totem, resembling a toy, is drawn with special ink to depict the Vlder healing mark, enhancing the healing effects of Luxite Blessing.

editor_name: 前传线31-剑-SSR-武器31_剑 1+

name: Vanguard Broadsword
editor_name: 前传线32-剑-SSR-武器32_剑 2+
前传线33-剑-SSR-武器33_剑 3+
前传线34-枪-SSR-武器34_枪 1+
前传线35-枪-SSR-武器35_枪 2+
前传线36-枪-SSR-武器36_枪 3+
前传线37-斧-SSR-武器37_斧 1+
前传线38-斧-SSR-武器38_斧 2+
前传线39-斧-SSR-武器39_斧 3+
前传线40-弓-SSR-武器40_弓 1+
前传线41-弓-SSR-武器41_弓 2+
前传线42-弓-SSR-武器42_弓 3+
前传线43-杖-SSR-武器43_杖 1+
前传线44-杖-SSR-武器44_杖 2+
前传线45-杖-SSR-武器45_杖 3+

name: Iron Necklace
editor_name: 前传线46-饰品-N-武器46_进攻类副武器
desc: A few irregular iron blocks are strung together, with some small rust marks on them. However, as a piece of jewelry, some people still appreciate this rough and unrefined style.

name: Iron Gauntlet
editor_name: 前传线47-饰品-N-武器47_生存类副武器
desc: A gauntlet crafted a long time ago that can still be used today. Rather than its actual defensive capabilities, it provides a sense of security to the wearer.

name: Bronze Necklace
editor_name: 前传线48-饰品-R-武器48_进攻类副武器 1-
desc: Crafted from bronze and shaped like a recumbent beast, it has some weight, but it is nothing to a strong and robust warrior.

editor_name: 前传线49-饰品-R-武器49_进攻类副武器 2-

name: Wolf Fang Necklace
editor_name: 前传线50-饰品-R-武器50_进攻类副武器 3-
desc: Hunters often have to drive away wolf packs that harry the town and make necklaces out of their harmful fangs.

name: Armored Gauntlet
editor_name: 前传线51-饰品-R-武器51_生存类副武器 1-
desc: Modified from a battle-tested shield, it may have an aged appearance, but its practicality is the greatest strength.

editor_name: 前传线52-饰品-R-武器52_生存类副武器 2-

name: Scorched Sorceress's Hat
editor_name: 前传线53-饰品-R-武器53_生存类副武器 3-
desc: A hat left behind by a Sorceress with burn marks from an explosion. It seems to have effectively protected its previous owner from harm during an accident and remained undamaged.

editor_name: 前传线54-饰品-SR-武器54_进攻类副武器 1
前传线55-饰品-SR-武器55_进攻类副武器 2
前传线56-饰品-SR-武器56_进攻类副武器 3
前传线57-饰品-SR-武器57_进攻类副武器 4
前传线58-饰品-SR-武器58_进攻类副武器 5
前传线59-饰品-SR-武器59_进攻类副武器 6

name: Rejection Mask
editor_name: 前传线60-饰品-SR-武器60_生存类副武器 1
desc: A serious-looking mask that can counteract a significant portion of the effects of Luxite Blessing. It can also help experienced priests recall their master's discipline.

name: Thorny Ring
editor_name: 前传线61-饰品-SR-武器61_生存类副武器 2
desc: It was originally a type of herb used for stopping bleeding, but its side effect was found to cause users to become easily irritable. After generations of selective breeding, this thorn-woven ring can amplify the effects of anger appropriately.

editor_name: 前传线62-饰品-SR-武器62_生存类副武器 3

name: Evergreen Pendent
editor_name: 前传线63-饰品-SR-武器63_生存类副武器 4
desc: Made of a combination of semi-Luxite and semi-jade, this pendant often promotes a quick recovery from injuries and ailments.

name: Spring Tonic
editor_name: 前传线64-饰品-SR-武器64_生存类副武器 5
desc: Made from wild-grown medicinal herbs and crystal-clear dew, this weapon can awaken the primal survival instincts of warriors and create a resonance between their lives.

editor_name: 前传线65-饰品-SR-武器65_生存类副武器 6
前传线66-饰品-SSR1-武器66_进攻类副武器 1+
前传线67-饰品-SSR1-武器67_进攻类副武器 2+

name: Maverick's Cloak
editor_name: 前传线68-饰品-SSR1-武器68_进攻类副武器 3+
desc: This cloak may look humble, but it can conceal one's movements or intentions from others.

name: True Lens
editor_name: 前传线69-饰品-SSR1-武器69_进攻类副武器 4+
desc: A well-thought-out design created by a retired veteran. It is a complex device with a mechanism for the ballistic correction of most projectiles. While it is very useful, there is a risk of it becoming a crutch for rookie soldiers.

name: Flying Blade Armguard
editor_name: 前传线70-饰品-SSR1-武器70_进攻类副武器 5+
desc: A quiet and complex blade launching device capable of loading independently and chaining multiple shots together. It is easy to use, which makes it ideal for assassination missions.

name: Berserk Incense
editor_name: 前传线71-饰品-SSR1-武器71_进攻类副武器 6+
desc: The incense is made from primitive materials such as trace amounts of Luxite, animal fluids, fused resin, herbs, and ash. It can induce a state of raging fury and pain tolerance, greatly enhancing combat capabilities. For some Luccians who have difficulty in transforming themselves, it can also easily trigger their transformation.

editor_name: 前传线72-饰品-SSR1-武器72_生存类副武器 1+
前传线73-饰品-SSR1-武器73_生存类副武器 2+

name: Crystal Burst Armor
editor_name: 前传线74-饰品-SSR1-武器74_生存类副武器 3+
desc: A highly advanced suit of armor. Thanks to its Luxite-based materials, it is capable of absorbing a significant amount of force before reflecting it back at the attacker. It is even capable of shattering weapons used on it. The design is quite unique and doesn't match any of the factions in Rodinia.

editor_name: 前传线75-饰品-SSR1-武器75_生存类副武器 4+
desc: It is a confidential formula that enables a cool sensation throughout the body. It accelerates the healing of wounds with Luxite Blessing while providing a protective layer on the skin surface to prolong its efficacy. Highly recommended for use during summer or under intense sunlight. Travelers heading to Elaman often purchase some for their journey.

name: Spring Pill
editor_name: 前传线76-饰品-SSR1-武器76_生存类副武器 5+
desc: Made by mixing condensed Vltar Mountain mint with the Spring Tonic recipe, providing a longer-lasting aroma and refreshing sensation while improving focus.

name: Old Scrolls of Auguste
editor_name: 前传线77-饰品-SSR1-武器77_生存类副武器 6+
desc: It is a worn notebook that contains detailed records of the knight's creed, rules, various tactics and strategies, and military management methods. Among them, one article emphasizes the importance of inspiration, written by the squadron leader Auguste.

editor_name: 前传线78-剑-SR-武器78_伊利亚剑 1
前传线79-剑-SR-武器79_伊利亚剑 2
前传线80-弓-SR-武器80_伊利亚弓 1
前传线81-弓-SR-武器81_伊利亚弓 2
前传线82-饰品-SR-武器82_伊利亚副武器 1
前传线83-饰品-SR-武器83_伊利亚副武器 2

name: Beheading Machete
editor_name: 前传线84-剑-SSR1-武器84_伊利亚剑 1+
desc: An almost circular, hooked blade designed for efficient beheading of enemies by the Hanged Men from high places, or for painfully suspending enemies in the air. It has also become a form of torture in the Papal States.

editor_name: 前传线85-剑-SSR1-武器85_伊利亚剑 2+

name: Irian Combat Bow
editor_name: 前传线86-弓-SSR1-武器86_伊利亚弓 1+
desc: Made with lightweight yet sturdy materials, it can endure a certain amount of melee damage which makes it ideal for special operatives who might need to make a hasty retreat.

editor_name: 前传线87-弓-SSR1-武器87_伊利亚弓 2+
前传线88-饰品-SSR1-武器88_伊利亚副武器 1+
前传线89-饰品-SSR1-武器89_伊利亚副武器 2+
前传线90-杖-SR-武器90_教皇国杖 1
前传线91-杖-SR-武器91_教皇国杖 2
前传线92-枪-SR-武器92_教皇国枪 1
前传线93-枪-SR-武器93_教皇国枪 2
前传线94-饰品-SR-武器94_教皇国副武器 1
前传线95-饰品-SR-武器95_教皇国副武器 2

name: Skeleton Staff
editor_name: 前传线96-杖-SSR1-武器96_教皇国杖 1+
desc: The gloomy yet stylish bone wand is the last legacy of a prominent Sanctuary Priest in the Papal States. As long as its power is not depleted, the user's spirit will endure even after the body perishes.

editor_name: 前传线97-杖-SSR1-武器97_教皇国杖 2+

name: Doomsday Scythe
editor_name: 前传线98-枪-SSR1-武器98_教皇国枪 1+
desc: A sickle emitting an aura of decay that can unleash its maximum power when silently approaching enemies.

editor_name: 前传线99-枪-SSR1-武器99_教皇国枪 2+
前传线100-饰品-SSR1-武器100_教皇国副武器 1+
前传线101-饰品-SSR1-武器101_教皇国副武器 2+
前传线102-剑-SR-武器102_骑士团剑 1
前传线103-剑-SR-武器103_骑士团剑 2
前传线104-枪-SR-武器104_骑士团枪 1
前传线105-枪-SR-武器105_骑士团枪 2
前传线106-斧-SR-武器106_骑士团斧 1
前传线107-斧-SR-武器107_骑士团斧 2
前传线108-弓-SR-武器108_骑士团弓 1
前传线109-弓-SR-武器109_骑士团弓 2
前传线110-杖-SR-武器110_骑士团杖 1
前传线111-杖-SR-武器111_骑士团杖 2
前传线112-饰品-SR-武器112_骑士团副武器 1
前传线113-饰品-SR-武器113_骑士团副武器 2
前传线114-饰品-SR-武器114_骑士团副武器 3
前传线115-饰品-SR-武器115_骑士团副武器 4

name: Ever-Burning Blade
editor_name: 前传线116-剑-SSR2-武器116_骑士团剑 1+
desc: This sword is the pinnacle of Luxite-infused weaponry. With its blade perpetually engulfed in flames, this extraordinary and symbolic sword still awaits a knight who can fully wield it.

name: Senator Swift Sword
editor_name: 前传线117-剑-SSR2-武器117_骑士团剑 2+
desc: The Council of Knights once had a knight renowned for his elegant and swift swordplay, having never been defeated in a one-on-one duel. However, his superior skills were never passed down, and only his sword was left to be preserved for future generations.

name: Skeleton Spear
editor_name: 前传线118-枪-SSR2-武器118_骑士团枪 1+
desc: This legendary spear is crafted from the bones of fallen warriors, infused with sorrow, rage, and hatred, striking fear into the hearts of enemies as they are dragged into the depths.

name: Nameless Staff
editor_name: 前传线119-枪-SSR2-武器119_骑士团枪 2+
desc: An antique designed to be deceptively solid, this weapon has its weight distributed to both ends. It can be swung with ease and still generate enough force to penetrate armor and cause internal damage to enemies. It appears to have come from the Far East.

editor_name: 前传线120-斧-SSR2-武器120_骑士团斧 1+

name: Tuning Hammer
editor_name: 前传线121-斧-SSR2-武器121_骑士团斧 2+
desc: The tuning hammer was originally used by the Union to check the tuning of the holy bells in various council halls. However, it was later discovered that this hammer had a remarkable effect when used to educate enemies, with most of them confessing their crimes after the first strike.

name: Longbow of Martyrs
editor_name: 前传线122-弓-SSR2-武器122_骑士团弓 1+
desc: This longbow is a precious relic from the Second War of Light. It has been wielded by many outstanding knights in defense of their vows. Anyone who proves capable of wielding this bow will win the respect and support of the knights, and anyone struck by its arrows will find themselves marked as an enemy of the people.

name: Star-Raid Crossbow
editor_name: 前传线123-弓-SSR2-武器123_骑士团弓 2+
desc: This crossbow was once wielded by a former city defense general of the Union during a protracted night-time siege. Its bolts flew like shooting stars, dazzlingly fast and accurate, maintaining the defenders' high morale and turning the hopeless situation into a victorious one.

name: Focus Wand
editor_name: 前传线124-杖-SSR2-武器124_骑士团杖 1+
desc: After carefully grinding several pieces of Luxite into specific arc shapes, they are combined with a wand to more precisely converge the effects of Luxite Blessing. The original crafter of this wand was also responsible for the lighting design of the Knight's Council Hall.

name: Resentment Broom
editor_name: 前传线125-杖-SSR2-武器125_骑士团杖 2+
desc: It was originally a powerful healing wand specially crafted by a Sorceress as a token of love for her sweetheart. However, the recipient betrayed her, and the curse began to spread.

name: Space-time Ring
editor_name: 前传线126-饰品-SSR2-武器126_骑士团副武器 1+
desc: It comes from a short-lived wizard among Luxite Knights. Inspired by the sudden birth of Luxite, it can make the wearer teleport in space. Later generations further enhanced its effect and energy endurance. To this day, nobody can resist his curiosity about it.

editor_name: 前传线127-饰品-SSR2-武器127_骑士团副武器 2+

name: Roaring Flint
editor_name: 前传线128-饰品-SSR2-武器128_骑士团副武器 3+
desc: A possible weapon for the knights who make use of Luxite, containing a fragment imbued with the power of flame. After being modified, it is no longer limited to targeting single objects. Due to the extensive collateral damage, the Union finally decided to add regulations limiting its use.

editor_name: 前传线129-饰品-SSR2-武器129_骑士团副武器 4+
前传线130-剑-SSR3-武器130_晶石看板剑
前传线131-枪-SSR3-武器131_晶石看板枪
前传线132-斧-SSR3-武器132_晶石看板斧
前传线133-弓-SSR3-武器133_晶石看板弓
前传线134-杖-SSR3-武器134_晶石看板杖
前传线135-饰品-SSR3-武器135_晶石看板副武器1
前传线136-饰品-SSR3-武器136_晶石看板副武器2
前传线137-饰品-SSR3-武器137_晶石看板副武器3
